subject: RE: [junit] Help Need!!! Urgent!I would like to test a method repeatedly with various inputs
messageBody:
> PS: You're likely to get better responses if you do *NOT* write
> "Help Need!!! Urgent!" in your subject line. After all, if you
> were PAYING me for this help, I'd be quick to help, but since
> you're looking for FREE, VOLUNTARY assistance, politeness helps.

I couldn't agree more. In fact I have another solution but since I already
presented it in another mail, I let him search the archive. (hint:
"constructor")

-Vladimir
